name: Zekrom & Reshiram Pokemon Showdown Style
description: A zekrom and reshiram based CSS made for Pokemon Showdown servers. If you see any error or something that looks weird, please PM me in a server such as Origin
additional_info:
To see this stylesheet download Stylish and add this style, and then load Pokemon showdown. 
Updates:

    14ᵗʰ February 2015:
      - .maintabbarbottom's shadow    

    15ᵗʰ February 2015:
      - .revealed 

    27ᵗʰ February 2015:
      - .select:hover    
      - .popupmenu button:hover
      - fixed the .closebutton:hover, .minimizebutton:hover problem

    22ⁿᵈ March 2015:
      - putting .select's border-top-left-radius to 0px

    11ᵗʰ April 2015:
      - Added some credits

    22ⁿᵈ April 2015:
      - fixed some indenting.
      - fixed some margin.

    28ᵗʰ June 2015:
      - fixed the rainbow menugroup buttons.
